mapper.select: select * from ptclass where id=#{id} AND TO_CHAR(pttime,'YYYY-MM-dd') = TO_DATE(#{pttime},'YYYY-MM-dd') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(pttime,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:MI') asc
mapper.delete: delete from reservation where id=#{id} and idx=#{idx}
mapper.update: update ptclass set r_check=#{r_check} where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reservation where id=#{id} and idx=#{idx}

SELECT p.idx, p.PTTIME, m.id, m.name FROM PTCLASS p LEFT JOIN RESERVATION r ON p.IDX = r.IDX LEFT JOIN MEMBERS m ON r.ID = m.ID where p.id=#{id} and TO_CHAR(pttime,'YYYY-MM-dd') = TO_DATE(#{pttime},'YYYY-MM-dd')
